text: Batwoman is a name of many fictional characters of DC Comics. The characters are commonly in association of the superhero Batman. The best known Batwomen are Kathy Kane and Kate Kane. == In other media == The character has appeared in television series, toys, and video games. She is played by Ruby Rose and Javicia Leslie in the television series Batwoman. Category:DC Comics characters Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Batwoman
